name: The Only One (AlbertoGameDev)
description:
The Only One is my first 'solo dev' game. 

It's a first person battle royale where you will have to find weapons, granades, ammo and health packs, as well as do parkour among the buildings, jump high and slide.

Try to survive, and defend yourself against the IA enemies at all cost to be the last standing and get the victory!

It was made entirely by myself (except the 3D models of the enemy and the weapons), including all the programming, art, UI, animations, database, etc.

 It has procedural map generation, so every match is unique! I hope you like it. 

Any feedback will be welcome :)

Do you think you can be... the Only one?
